notes.text: The paste feature with hidden properties used as the description now works correctly
We now ensure that the Share: Microsoft Teams functionality works correctly in our building blocks
Columns with a specific scale for a given unit of measure are now correctly exported
We've resolved an issue where fields were not shown if a maximum annotation or a minimum annotation was used but no date annotation was used in validation
We now ensure that back navigation works correctly with high latency networks
We no longer show the dialog of the create action if all the parameters are hidden
We now show all the information messages that are sent as part of the back-end response for an action
We now support displaying a hierarchy within a value help
We now ensure that the condensed mode of the grid table works correctly
We now show an illustrated message if there is no data in a chart
We’ve resolved an issue where a generic error message was shown after a successful action with warnings for non-strict handling
You can now change the illustrated messages of tables
We no longer show error messages from the default values function for the action parameter dialog
We now prevent multiple clicks on an action button for an intent-based navigation
You can now move nodes up and down using the context menu in tree tables
We now properly send `null` when clearing a nullable field
We've improved our documentation for the controller extensions
We now ensure that semantic object mappings are correctly applied when navigating from a DataFieldForIntentBasedNavigation
We’ve now enabled the date picker with a minimum allowed date and a maximum allowed date
We now ensure that side effects work correctly when the manifest setting for the object page uses a contextPath parameter
We’ve now increased the loading threshold to 100 when scrolling in a non-responsive table
We've resolved an issue where the custom text defined for the empty title of the object page wasn't appearing correctly
We've resolved an issue with adding a filter field at runtime
We've resolved an issue where objects containing special characters in their names could not be deleted
We've resolved an issue within the flexible column layout that occurs when Edit is clicked for non-draft entities on the right panel
We now ensure that the override execution of the onPageReady method is reverted from AfterAsync to After
We've resolved an issue that prevented the Delete button from triggering any deletion from an object page without a header's title
The editFlow.editDocument method now returns a rejected promise in case of an error
We now ensure that the Go button is also triggered when users navigate back to the app
We now ensure that embedded BTP applications open correctly in a new browser tab when navigating from the table context menu
We now ensure that the navigate function cannot be retriggered if it has already been called
We now ensure that an email address is correcty parsed
FieldControl annotation in action parameter dialog now works as expected for edm.paths
We now ensure that the custom operator in the FilterBar building block is loaded when the app starts
We now request the entity properties for a bound action configured with a returned entity type
